div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem octauo
die mensis marcij anno quo supra

The said' day Alexander mathesone complenyet to the aldirman and balyeis that
patry Red' hed' tribulit Syme murray and put him out of ane Croft
clamit be him in heritage and quhilkis tribulance the said' patry denyit
And' in continent thareftir the said' actioun' was put to the decisione of
ane assis' et cetera quhilkis riplie auisit the gret athe suorne the richtis resonis'
and allegaciounis of batht the said' partiis to giddir with the witnes herd'
seyne and vndirstandin deliuerit be the moutht of patry leslie eldar forspekar
that thai coud' nocht deliuere anent the said' tribulance quhile the ground'
Richt of the said' Croft be decidit quhar' It efferis

Eodem die Compertum fuit per legittimum Inquisicionum Curie quod Jacobus
Wormet est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Johannis Wormet patris
suj

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xijo die mensis
Maij anno quo supra

The said' day the balyeis assignit the law day eftir pasche hereftir to Johne litstar
tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne of Cullane for the wrang
wis' manvring and occupeing of ane forland' of his without tak or assedacioun'
of him as day of peremptour' but ony dilatouris with consent and assent of batht
the said' partiis

The said' day Alexander malysone for him and Dauid Kintor askis at the aldirman
and balyeis Marrouschip to streik thar tua thridpart of nethis with Ande
gif thai coud' nocht get fallouschip thai Offerit thame redy to strek ane
thridpart of ane neth' with thar tua thridpartis Ande to gif alsmekle'
fysche for It as ony thridpart of Done gevis thar' expens' and Costis being
allouit

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis assignit tuysday that next Cumis
to Dauid cristj tile ansuer perempturlie to the borghe' fundin one him be Alexander
gray for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of thre prevys stanis of lynt

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjto die mensis
marcij anno quo supra

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorn' Johnne' cullan forspekar that
Johnne' myln' in petcapill is quyt of the borrowgang of fiwe hidis quhilk
William King allegit that he come borgh' to him for mekill Johnn' in Durno

Eodem die Johannes myln' in petcapill fecit constituit creauit nominauit et
ordanit Johannem mar et Dauid lesly coniunctim et diuisim suos veros legitimos
et Indubitatos procuratores actores factores ad prosequendum Willelmum King pro suis
dampnis et expensis agendum defendendum litiscontestandum calumpniandum Ceteram omniam
et singulam faciendum promittens de Rato et grato

Eodem die Dauid Walcar fecit constituit creauit nominauit et ordinauit
Alexandrum malisone burgensem de Abirdene suum verum legitimum et Indubitatem procuratorem
actorem et factorem dans et concedens eidem suam liberam presentatem ad prosequendum Rober
tum Walcar pro perturbio factus dictus Dauid per dictum Robertum Agendum defen
dendum liticontestandum Ceteram omniam et singulam faciendum Promittens de Rato
et grato et cetera

The said' viij day of the monetht of marche comperit mastir Alexander bysset with
mastir Johne marscheale his forspekar and schew that it was comin to his
knavlege that margaret buchane hed' causit thomas leslie to gif Sesin
to Alexander talyour of ane pece of ane yerd' pertening to him as he allegis
quhilkis was gevin in Contrar Justice as he vndirstandis herfor he
protestit that the said' pretendit Sesin turne him to nay preiudice
anent the said' pece of yerd' and entires' at his yet

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xixo
die mensis marcij anno quo supra

The said day the Relict of Williame Ranisone grantit hir' pait
of tene Schillingis be the handis of Robert fraser Cordonare akit
in the buk obefor

The said day thome straloche grauntit him aving to Williame
Watsone xxij s' and iiij d' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to
pay within terme of law

The said' day comperit Alexander Prat and Solemptlie protestit
that quhat euire Is done to ser Johne litstar in the actis
of this Courtis or in the Consistorj or vthir wais anent
anent taile of ane yerd' quhar' he dueliis pertening to Johne
andirsone Sone and ayr to vmquhile William Andirson'
turne the said' Williame to nay preiudice sene he is vteuthe
the Realme

The said' day It was fundin that Androw grig is aving
to Androw meldrum iij quartaris of ane stane of lynt
quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law
of Sufficient merchand' gude

The saide day Comperit margaret buchane with thomas Ridale
hir' forspekar and Schew how that scho hed' ane hous' in tak of
Dauid Kintor et cetera Ande the said' Dauid has cumin and takin avay
the keis herfor scho protestit to be quyt of the maile sene the
tyme he Intrometit with the said' keis

The said' Dauid cristj grauntit him aving tile Alexander gray j previs'
stane of lynt and v scott quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxijo mensis
marcij anno quo supra et cetera

The said day comperit Johne of myln' at the myln' of Inuerramsay and' exponit befor
the alderman and' bailyes how that he was warnit be the officiar to comper
within the tolbutht of the said' burgh' to ansueir at the Instance of Williame Ran
aldsone in the crag and' becaus' the said William comperit nocht to follow nor to
persew the said Johnne he protestit solempnitly for his costis skaithtis and
expensis of the said William or euire he be herd' in Jugment and' to ansuere nocht
vnto the tyme he be new warnit be the officiar at the command' of the balyes

The thrid day the bailyes assignit the law day eftir pasche peremptourlie to Johnne
auchneiff to preiw the belt follouit be Duncan colisone cessionar to mariory auch
nef gevin to the said' Johnez douchtir be the said mariory

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvj die mensis
marcij Anno domini millesimo quingentesimo Septimo

The said' day Comperit gilbert litstar burges of the said' burghe' and opinlie exponit
and schew how that he was to pas' his pilgramage to Sanct James with the grace
of god' and that he hed' causit the belman pas' throw the haile towne diuers' tymes
and warnit oppinlie ale and sindrie personis that hed' ony clames to him othir of dettis
or vthirwais and that hed' deliuerit him ony clatht or ony vthir stuf to lytt or hed'
laid' him ony weddis that he was redy tile ansuer' to ale mane furthtwith
but ony proces' Ande to pay ale Somes aving to ale personis Ande that the clatht
and vthir stuf gevin to him to lytt was redy fourty dais bigane quhilk warning
was maid' thre mercat dais quharfor he Solemptlie protestit that gif ony
clatht or' vthir stuf gevin to him happinis to be avay or onywis' skathtit that it
turne him his ayris executoris nor assignez to nay preiudice considiring he was reddy
tile deliuer ale gudis being in his handis for the pament aving to him and that he his ayris
ayris executoris nor assignez be nocht persevit tharfor forthir thane law wile nor he compellit
tile ansuer tharfor vthirwais thane law wile

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' patry leslie forspekar
that Alexander Kintor sale serue and fische Dauid Kintoris thridpart nethis fischingis of Done
for this Instant yer' and he sale deliuer to the said' Dauid ane barrele of Sal
mond' and fund' him Souerte for it and the said' Dauid sal pay to him xiij s' and
iiij d' for his fee bigane Ande gif ples' the said' Alexander to haue the said'
xiij s' and iiij d' and leif the fischingis of the said' Walter it salbe lesum to him

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxix die
marcij Anno quo supra

The said' day the balyeis assignit friday nixt eftir the hed' court
of the said' burghe' to patry tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one
him be Alexander mathosone for the wranguis' Intrometting labouring
and manuring of ane Croft of his liand' within the fredome of the burghe
one the west part of the Denburne betuix the Croft of vmquhile Alexander
Kintor one the est and the landis of Rubislaw one the west part et cetera And'
discernit the Copy of the said' borghe to the said' patry

The said' day the balyeis continevit the actioun' anent xiij s' and iiij d' of
annuele clamit be James Wormet sone and ayr tile vmquhile Johne
Wormet to the law day nef nixt hereftir

The said' day the balyeis assignit the law dy next hereftir follouing
tile Alexander ramsay to ansuer to the borghe fundin one him be
Androw edindeauche for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xl s'

The said' day gilbert menyeis Come Souerte tile ansuer to Richerd'
Waus for ony thingis that he hed' to say to Williame boll

The said' day thir personis vndir writin chosin and Suorne in ane assis' that Is to
say Alexander bannermane seref deput Dauid menyeis Jonhne of Cullane Jonhne Ratre Dauid
Andirsone patry Red' Dauid ruthirfurd' Duncan fyf Alexander malisone Dauid fynne
Androw meldrum William Kintor and patry arthour' burges of the said' burghe with consent ande
assent of James Colisone one that ane part Ande Isabele crichtone one that
vthir part Inclusit within the Counsalhous' of the said tolbutht to determe knaw
and decid' the borghe' fundin one the said' Isabele et cetera be the said' James anent
the trubuling of him in the manuring of his tak and fischingis of Done et cetera continevit
the said' borghe' In siclik forme and effect as It standis in now to tuysday the
penult day of the said' monetht of marche Instant in hop of Concord' Ande that
day the saide partiis to Comper' befor the said' assis' Chosin suorne and Inclusit to
determe apon' the said' burghe' Ande falyeing of ony of the said' assis' tile
vndirlie the decisioun' of vthiris that may be Comprehendit for the tym'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem penultimo die
mensis marcij anno quo supra

The said' day mastir Androw patirsone producit ane Act vndir the subscriptioun' of mastir
Alexander Setone that thomas meldrum was chargit vndir the pane of cursing
that he suld' nocht Inquiet nor' trubule be him self nor' nayne that he may lett anent the vptakin of the male of the land' of vmquhile Alexander King
Ande thareftir he askit the male of the said' land' et cetera and warnit him to flitt
at the next Witsonday at Jonhne portar that Inhabit and occupeis the land'
of Alexander King

The saide day thir personis chosin and Suorne in ane assis' that is to say
Alexander bannermane of Wattirtone Dauid menyeis Jonhne Cullane Johne
ratre Dauid Andirsone patry rede Dauid ruthirfurde Duncan fif Alexander
malisone Dauid fynne William Kintor Androw meldrum and patry arthour'
burges of the said' burghe to determe and knaw the borghe' fundin one Isabell
of Crichtone the Relict of vmquhile Johne Wormet that scho hed' wrang
uislie and agane the law tribulit James Colisone in the manuring of his
tak and fisching' of Done quhilkis he has in tak and assedacioun' of the toune
of Abirdene vndir thar commone sele Ande for the wranguis' Intrometing
with his Cobile and fische takin with hir' to the Nomer of fiwe Salmond'
and demi et cetera fand' the said' borghe' availe be the moutht of the saide Alexander banner
man / forspekar of the said' assis' for the quhilksi the said' Isabele was
in ane amerciament of the Court sic as scho aw to tyne of law Ande aw
to Amend' as law wile et cetera Ande to Restoir' the said v salmond' and demi
tile mastir Robert Elphinstone parsone of Kincardin et cetera and that was
gevin for dome

Octauo die mensis aprilis anno Domini Millesimo quingenesimo Septimo Johannes Cullane
fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Johannem mar' et magistrum Johannem marscheale
coniunctim et diuisim suos veros legittimos et Indubitatos procuratores actores factores
et negociorum suorum infrascriptos gestores et cetera dans et concedens eisdem ac eorum alteri
suam liberam et omnimodam potestatem ac mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo ad comparendum
coram preposito et balliuis dicti burgi xij die mensis aprilis Instanti ad prosequendum plegium
per eum aliis porrectum super Johannem litstar pro iniusta occupacione cuius terre sue anter
ioris et cetera sine assedacione ipsius et cetera Agendum defendendum prosequendum Calumpniandum promittens
de Rato et gato in vberiore forma procuratorij Cum ceteris claus' necessariis et oportunis

Nono die aprilis anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo septimo magister Andreas gray
fecit constituit creauit et nominauit gilbertum hay de ardendracht militem
et Dauid mar' coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores actores et factores dans
et concedens eisdem ac eorum alteri suisque substitutis pluribus aut viij suam
liberam potestatem ad defendendum Johannem talyour suum nepotem et
conseruandum ipsum terras suas et bonam Indempnes et liberas Agendum
defendendum prosequendum calumpniandum et protestandum Ceteram omniam et
Singula faciendum gerendum et excercendum quo ipse constituens facere posset
promittens de Rato et grato Cum Ceteris clausulis necessariis et opor
tunis
